TestInfo.Name: All log in to get user ids
A, B, C, D requests my discussion info, sees 1 discussion

A, B, C logs in. A and B each sends 5 message (interleaved) to group. A, B, C receives 10 in order. D logs in and receive 10 in orders, D acks first 5 messages then logs out. D re-logs in, receive last 5 messages and ack them.
